274 from 1953 to 1970, United Airlines offered a men-only flight featuring cigars, cocktails, & full steak dinners 🥩🚬🍸👩🏻‍✈️✈️ YES posted 4 days ago by Hanging_Chad 22 comments award share report block Dudes Posting Their W’s @DudespostingWs • 6d From 1953 to 1970, United Airlines offered a men-only flight featuring cigars, cocktails, and full steak dinners 🔥

Or will it be like the wnba where you won't support it but beg others to keep it in business. permalink parent award report block reply Aquamine-Amarine 2 points 4 days ago Comparing a plane to a sport isn't exactly a good comparison. A male only or female only plane would be far more popular than a sport that's just for entertainment, which you don't really need. Unlike a plane, which you do need if you work or travel.
